mapper.select: SELECT board_id,user_id,title,writer,preview,likes,thumbnail FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* FROM( SELECT * FROM proj_board ORDER BY reg_date)a) WHERE rn<=18

SELECT board_id,user_id,title,writer,preview,likes,thumbnail FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* FROM( SELECT * FROM proj_board ORDER BY reg_date)a)
WHERE rn<=6*3+6 AND rn>=6*3+1 AND board_id<=30;

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn , a.* FROM( SELECT * FROM proj_board ORDER BY likes DESC)a)t
WHERE rn<=(#{i}+1)*3 AND rn>=#{i}*3+1

SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* FROM proj_board a JOIN (SELECT to_id FROM followers WHERE user_id = 'kim123' )b on a.user_id = b.to_id
WHERE rn<=100 AND rn>=1
ORDER BY a.reg_date
